HotelElement.Name: Pao Jin Poon Beach Front Villa

Address.Address1: MOO4 MARET, LAMAI BEACH, KOH SAMUI 146/38

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Pao Jin Poon Beach Front Villa in Koh Samui (Maret), you'll be close to Silver Beach and Hin Ta and Hin Yai. This 4-star villa is within close proximity of Coco Splash Waterpark and Wat Lamai.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 3 air-conditioned rooms featuring private pools and plasma televisions. Kitchenettes are outfitted with refrigerators and microwaves. Satellite programming and MP3 docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Limited parking is available onsite.
